thread.title: BRIEF-U.S. Silica Holdings Announces Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.39

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-U.S. Silica Holdings Announces Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.39
text:
U.S. Silica Holdings Inc:
* U.S. SILICA HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER RESULTS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.39 * Q1 REVENUE $369.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $366.5 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.47 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.54 * ANTICIPATES THAT ITS CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR 2018 WILL BE IN RANGE OF $300 MILLION TO $350 MILLION
* FOR Q2, CO EXPECTS VOLUMES IN OIL & GAS TO BE UP IN RANGE OF 10 TO 15 PERCENT
* COMPANY EXPECTS TO CLOSE ON ITS $750 MILLION ACQUISITION OF EP MINERALS BY END OF THIS MONTH Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
